title: Ripple Lab’s XRP dominates the crypto market, beating ETH in gains across most US states
description: Recent developments in the Ripple Labs and the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) have brought about significant implications in the market, among them influencing XRP’s market value. title: Elon Musk impersonator’s deceptive claims about XRP on X app
description: In a recent turn of events, an individual impersonating Elon Musk, the CEO of X (formerly Twitter), has made false claims regarding the platform’s plans to introduce a payments system with cryptographic rails. title: Users Lose $588,000 in BTC by Downloading the Fake Ledger Live App
description:
Blockchain sleuth ZachXBT unearthed the appearance of a fake Ledger Live app on the official Microsoft App Store, causing a loss of more than 16 Bitcoins (BTC). As per a post dated November 5, shared by ZachXBT on X, users are trapped to downloading the scam, “Ledger Live Web3”, creating an illusion of Ledger Live, […]

The post Users Lose $588,000 in BTC by Downloading the Fake Ledger Live App appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Here’s a Reasonable Solana (SOL) Price Target for Next Bull Run, According to Ex-Goldman Sachs Executive Raoul Pal
description:
